thread.title: Model Cami Morrone is the centre of attention at the Brit Awards in nipple-flashing sheer dress
thread.title_full: Model Cami Morrone is the centre of attention at the Brit Awards in nipple-flashing sheer dress

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Model Cami Morrone is the centre of attention at the Brit Awards in nipple-flashing sheer dress
text:
(Photo: Getty Images Europe) Read More Perrie Edwards flashes her bum in seriously raunchy dress as Little Mix win their first ever Brit Award 
However, while Cami was purposefully baring her breasts, a few other stars inadvertently flashed more than they bargained for on the night. 
Little Mix singer Jade Thirlwall fell victim to an embarrassing wardrobe malfunction thanks to her revealing red carpet gown that left little to the imagination. Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall attending the Brit Awards (Photo: PA) Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall attending the Brit Awards (Photo: PA) (Photo: Rex Features) 
Showing off her long legs in the expensive-looking white silk gown, the strong winds in London threatened to expose far more than she probably hoped for. 
Jade was forced to hold down the front of her dress thanks to the sky-high thigh split that risked giving her a major Marilyn Monroe moment in front of the paparazzi. Read More Katy Perry's backing dancer steals limelight at Brit Awards for all the wrong reasons after tumbling off stage Perrie Edwards (Photo: ITV) Fearne Cotton and Holly Willoughby present Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall and Leigh-Anne Pinnock of Little Mix with the award for Best British Single (Photo: Getty Images) 
Her bandmate Perrie Edwards also ran into some trouble when the group went to collect their first ever BRIT award. 
As they made their way along the stage to the podium, Perrie appeared to struggle with her red carpet gown. 
Just like jade, the blonde stunner was forced to keep tight hold of the sexy outfit. Like us on Facebook
